title: Malaysia Overwater Rooms & Villas near Kuala Lumpur with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Resembling a tranquil palm tree extending out into the ocean, this resort epitomises paradise with its waterfront location and relaxed Polynesian-style spaces.

Spend sun-soaked days floating in the tranquil infinity pool, spectacularly positioned over the ocean below. Start your mornings in this tropical oasis with a blissful breakfast buffet and enjoy world-class dining across three diverse eateries. When it comes time to explore, take to the river by boat to see the mangroves or embark on a tour led by the hotel's expert team. 

Explore the nearby Sepang International Circuit, a must for motorsport enthusiasts. For those looking to unwind, rejuvenation is made easy at the onsite Avani Spa, while children get their own slice of paradise at the complimentary AvaniKids Club.
offer_address: 67, Jalan Pantai Bagan Lalang, Kampung Bagan Lalang, 43950 Sungai Pelek, Selangor, Malaysia

title: Malaysia Sepang Coastal Escape with Overwater Infinity Pool, Daily Breakfast, Daily Choice of Lunch or Dinner & Arrival Transfer
description:
Resembling a tranquil palm tree extending out into the ocean, Avani Sepang Goldcoast Resort epitomises paradise with its beachfront location and relaxed Polynesian-style spaces. Spend sun-soaked days floating in the tranquil infinity pool, spectacularly positioned over the ocean below. Start your mornings in this tropical oasis with a blissful breakfast buffet and enjoy world-class dining across four fantastic eateries.

Explore the nearby Sepang International Circuit, a must for motorsport enthusiasts. For those looking to unwind, rejuvenation is made easy at the onsite Avani Spa. The resort can organise an abundance of activities, including tours of the nearby mangroves, dragonfruit planting, ATV adventures and more (surcharges apply). As night falls, retreat to your private quarters to bask in the ocean breeze and breathtaking sunset views.
offer_address: 67 Jalan Pantai Bagan Lalang, Kg Bagan Lalang, Sungai Pelek, Selangor Darul Ehsan, Sepang 43950, Malaysia

title: Overwater Villa Getaway with All-Inclusive Daily Dining and Private Beachfront
description: Sleep above the azure waters of Malaysia’s coastline at the AVANI Sepang Goldcoast Resort - just forty minutes from Kuala Lumpur but a world away from the hustle and bustle. Lap up seclusion with a private beachfront location that'll have you switching off in privacy. With packages for two adults and two children, the whole family can enjoy delicious all-inclusive daily dining at three of the resort’s restaurants, two 30-minute massage vouchers, convenient private one-way airport transfer and more.
offer_address: 67, Jalan Pantai Bagan Lalang, Kampung Bagan Lalang, 43950 Sungai Pelek, Selangor, Malaysia

title: Secluded Overwater Villa Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Sleep above the azure waters of Malaysia’s coastline at the AVANI Sepang Goldcoast Resort - just 40 minutes' drive from Kuala Lumpur but a world away from the city's hustle and bustle. Ultimate seclusion and relaxation are guaranteed with a pristine private beachfront. With Two-Bedroom Villa packages for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under), the whole family can enjoy delicious all-inclusive dining (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner) at three of the resort’s restaurants, one 30-minute massage voucher per adult, a convenient private one-way airport transfer and more.
offer_address: 67, Jalan Pantai Bagan Lalang, Kampung Bagan Lalang, 43950 Sungai Pelek, Selangor, Malaysia

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Sepang Airport, an IHG Hotel
title: Malaysia City Break near Kuala Lumpur International Airport & Sepang International Circuit
description: Touch down into Kuala Lumpur layover convenience with a stay at Holiday Inn Sepang Airport, an IHG Hotel, perfectly located just moments from the city’s international Grand Prix circuit and Kuala Lumpur International Airport. After days spent exploring the city’s best, return to The Garden Cafe for easy-going local plates, Pitstop for cocktails and craft beers or head to the hotel’s wonderful outdoor pool and laze the afternoon away.
location_description: Holiday Inn Sepang Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Warisan Sentral 2, KIP Sentral, 43900 Sepang, Selangor, Malaysia

title: Malaysia Sepang Five-Star Resort Along the Beachfront
description: In the form of a palm tree extending out into the ocean, Avani Sepang Goldcoast Resort epitomises paradise with its beachfront location and Polynesian-style overwater villas. Sun-soaked days can be spent swimming in the infinity pool or relaxing with a signature massage or body scrub at AvaniSpa. If you have little ones in tow, make their day by dropping them off at AvaniKids club for supervised fun. Meanwhile, the four exceptional dining venues are sure to satisfy any craving.
offer_address: 67 Jalan Pantai Bagan Lalang, Kg Bagan Lalang, Sungai Pelek, Selangor Darul Ehsan, Sepang 43950, Malaysia
